createdeliverystream.name: CreateDeliveryStream
createdeliverystream.description: Grants permission to create a delivery stream

deletedeliverystream.name: DeleteDeliveryStream
deletedeliverystream.description: Grants permission to delete a delivery stream and its data

describedeliverystream.name: DescribeDeliveryStream
describedeliverystream.description: Grants permission to describe the specified delivery stream and gets the status

listdeliverystreams.name: ListDeliveryStreams
listdeliverystreams.description: Grants permission to list your delivery streams

listtagsfordeliverystream.name: ListTagsForDeliveryStream
listtagsfordeliverystream.description: Grants permission to list the tags for the specified delivery stream

putrecord.name: PutRecord
putrecord.description: Grants permission to write a single data record into an Amazon Kinesis Firehose delivery stream

putrecordbatch.name: PutRecordBatch
putrecordbatch.description: Grants permission to write multiple data records into a delivery stream in a single call, which can achieve higher throughput per producer than when writing single records

startdeliverystreamencryption.name: StartDeliveryStreamEncryption
startdeliverystreamencryption.description: Grants permission to enable server-side encryption (SSE) for the delivery stream

stopdeliverystreamencryption.name: StopDeliveryStreamEncryption
stopdeliverystreamencryption.description: Grants permission to disable the specified destination of the specified delivery stream

tagdeliverystream.name: TagDeliveryStream
tagdeliverystream.description: Grants permission to add or update tags for the specified delivery stream

untagdeliverystream.name: UntagDeliveryStream
untagdeliverystream.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified delivery stream

updatedestination.name: UpdateDestination
updatedestination.description: Grants permission to update the specified destination of the specified delivery stream
